short_summary: Stage 2 - Trans-Canada Highway 1 Pavement Restoration – Glacier National Park.
description: Parks Canada requires a contractor to remove and replace asphalt structure along Trans-Canada Highway 1 in order to safeguard the integrity of the roadway, ensuring public safety and accessibility through the National Parks. Work includes replacement of the asphalt pavement in Glacier National Park, consisting of mill and inlay 50 mm asphalt, 65 mm overlay, spray patch (crack repair), line painting, and the addition of concrete barrier. Up to 2 km of ditching will also be targeted within this project. Contractor shall perform and complete the Work no later than August 31, 2023
duration_in_months: Our solicitation is a two-stage process: First, we will be evaluating qualifications of all interested suppliers. Second, qualified suppliers will be invited to provide a financial bid on the project.
